document_data.name: The Sapient Sorcerer
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite polyhedron/82/The Living City: The Sapient Sorcerer|8}}
document_data.mainbody: '''The Sapient Sorcerer''' was a magic shop in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] that was owned and operated by [[Olcrannon Fossa]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This shop was located in the neighborhood of [[Tlasbras]] in the [[Ravens Bluff/Southside District|Southside District]] of Ravens Bluff. It was on southwestern corner of the intersection of [[Stonekeep End]] and the southern edge of [[Whisper Lane]].

Description.Structure: This shop was a one story building. It looked to be rather shabby, made in the rubble masonry style.
Description.Interior: The interior of the store was rather musky and had many cobwebs. Behind the counter was a sleeping cot that the owner rested on.
Description.Atmosphere: The shop had a gloomy atmosphere.

document_data.Services: The Sapient Sorcerer sold a variety of supplies for [[mage]]s. Including [[ink]]s, [[quill]]s, [[vellum]], [[inkstone]]s, different types of [[scrollcase]]s, [[scroll]]s containing minor [[spell]]s like ''[[comprehend languages]]'' or ''[[neutralize poison]]'', pebbles enchanted with ''[[continual light]]'', ''[[healing potion]]s'', crucibles, and general [[material component]]s.
